name: Digital Compass
description: This is a high precision and insanely beautiful digital compass.  Useful features:  Latitude, longitude and address  Full-screen map  True heading and magnetic heading  Magnetic strength  Slope level meter  Sensor status  Caution!  Do not use the app with magnetic covers.  If you encounter a direction error, calibrate your phone by waving the device in a figure 8, two or three times.  Follow us on YouTube!  https://axmt.co/YouTube  Follow us on Facebook!  https://www.facebook.com/DigitalCompass.Android/   20152020 Axiomatic Inc. All rights reserved.
